name: part_000
file: tmp_【重大発表あり!!!】宝鐘マリン生誕祭 3D LIVE！豪華ゲスト＆新曲お披露目！【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [NxtHvRVLzXM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Introduction title card for Houshou Marine's Birthday 3D LIVE 2024.
Animated story segment featuring Houshou Marine and her crew members (Pekora, Noel, Flare) building a ship.
Live performance of the song 'III' on stage.

subtitles.original: 作詞：Sena Kiryuuin 作曲・編曲：Giga
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Sena Kiryuuin / Composition & Arrangement: Giga

subtitles.original: はーい注目　まぁいっちょ踊ってこうか？
subtitles.english: Hey attention! Shall we dance one more time?

subtitles.original: 現役牛耳ってんのは…　あーぁーあーい
subtitles.english: The one who's currently taking the lead is... Aye aye aye.

subtitles.original: あれ〜？君たちの声　まだ足りてないんじゃないの〜？
subtitles.english: Huh? Your voices aren't loud enough yet, are they?

subtitles.original: Our night's just begun, aye let's blast it.
subtitles.english: Our night's just begun, aye let's blast it.

subtitles.original: 赤く火照る face
subtitles.english: A red, flushed face.

subtitles.original: ヒートアップしちゃって絡む sweat
subtitles.english: Heating up and tangling with sweat.

subtitles.original: 渇いた喉潤す　オアシスよマリンブルー
subtitles.english: Quench your dry throat. The oasis is Marine Blue.

subtitles.original: あっはーん！たまらないんでしょ？
subtitles.english: A-haan! You can't resist it, right?

subtitles.original: ぱっきゅん♡
subtitles.english: Pa-kyun♡

subtitles.original: From shore to shore, my moves bring the storm to the floor
subtitles.english: From shore to shore, my moves bring the storm to the floor

subtitles.original: Thunder rays blast a sonic boom, I ride the beat like I'm surfing shockwaves
subtitles.english: Thunder rays blast a sonic boom, I ride the beat like I'm surfing shockwaves

subtitles.original: Don't need no sunblock, I can make it rain 'cause you hit the jackpot
subtitles.english: Don't need no sunblock, I can make it rain 'cause you hit the jackpot

subtitles.original: Baby, get ready, if you wanna ride on with the OGs
subtitles.english: Baby, get ready, if you wanna ride on with the OGs

subtitles.original: アーッチチな二人はだぁれ？
subtitles.english: Who are the two who are smoking hot?

subtitles.original: Hands up ぶち上げたまえ！
subtitles.english: Hands up, let's turn it up!

subtitles.original: クラッときちゃう様な熱が足りない
subtitles.english: I need more heat, the kind that makes you feel dizzy.

subtitles.original: Our night's just begun, aye let's blast it.
subtitles.english: Our night's just begun, aye let's blast it.

subtitles.original: ハジけて派手にいったーれ！
subtitles.english: Burst out and go wild!

subtitles.original: (Yeah baby!) 来世まで we wanna party
subtitles.english: (Yeah baby!) We wanna party until our next life.

subtitles.original: All eyes on me, I can taste the high
subtitles.english: All eyes on me, I can taste the high

subtitles.original: Aye まだまだ沸いてこうぜ
subtitles.english: Aye, let's keep things boiling.

subtitles.original: はーい注目　まぁいっちょ踊ってこうか？
subtitles.english: Hey attention! Shall we dance one more time?

subtitles.original: 現役牛耳ってんのは…　あーぁーあーい
subtitles.english: The one who's currently taking the lead is... Aye aye aye.

subtitles.original: え・い・う・あー
subtitles.english: E-I-U-Ah

subtitles.original: よそ見しちゃやーん　マリンが bestest girl じゃん？
subtitles.english: Don't look away. Marine is the bestest girl, isn't she?

subtitles.original: 砂の数よりも魅力がある　君たちもう　ねぇ、虜でしょ？
subtitles.english: I have more charms than the grains of sand. You're already captivated, aren't you?

subtitles.original: 「お年の数程」って誰が言った？
subtitles.english: Who said 'as many as her age'?

subtitles.original: 大人の魅力よ
subtitles.english: It's adult charm.

subtitles.original: ておいコラァ！
subtitles.english: Hey, hold on!

subtitles.original: マリンは17さい♡
subtitles.english: Marine is 17 years old♡

subtitles.original: っておい聞けや！！
subtitles.english: Hey, listen to me!!

subtitles.original: 我慢の限界かな　とかってきゃあ！
subtitles.english: Maybe I'm at my limit... or something like that, kyaa!

subtitles.original: Bring in the heat that can't be splashed away (Hiiya!)
subtitles.english: Bring in the heat that can't be splashed away (Hiiya!)

subtitles.original: Fishing a big catch, the stardom I deserve
subtitles.english: Fishing a big catch, the stardom I deserve

subtitles.english: Might let you have a taste

subtitles.english: Treasure-like bare skin.

subtitles.original: やん見ないで、待って

subtitles.english: Beside a bonfire, our luring smoke takes you higher
